maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Receptionist
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Réceptionniste

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Receptionist
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Réceptionniste

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Hello \v[lore.title.seeker], and welcome to the headquarters of the \c[3]Bergen Digging Mates\c[0].
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker], et bienvenue dans le quartier général de l'\c[3]Amicale des Creuseurs de Bergen\c[0].

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: We manage the mining operations at Mt. Bergen and also try to reclaim the areas that were recently lost to the Track.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Nous supervisons les opérations d'excavation du Mont Bergen et essayons de reprendre les zones que l'on a perdus face au Tracé.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Talk to \c[3]Chief Miner Turis\c[0] back there if you want to help us out.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Parlez donc au \c[3]Chef Mineur Turis\c[0] derrière moi si vous voulez nous aider.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Turis McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Turis McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. No complications in the mine lately, so there's no work for you.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Ces derniers temps, nous avons eu aucun problème, donc nous n'avons rien à vous faire faire.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Hi!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Salut !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: A visitor fresh from outside, eh?\. No need to reply, I feel the sun's warmth still on you, child.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Un visiteur venant de loin, hein ?\. Pas besoin de répondre, je sens déjà la chaleur du soleil sur toi.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: ...b-bye?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: ... B-Bye ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Har, that look on your face!\. The name's Turis McEdinthil, Chief Miner of the Bergen Digging Mates.\. Welcome to our humble headquarters!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Ha ! Ça t'en bouche un coin hein ?\. Mon nom c'est Turis McEdinthil, Chef Mineur de l'Amicale des Creuseurs de Bergen.\. Bienvenue dans notre modeste quartier général !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Don't you worry, the icy mine might have cooled our manners but we don't feast on the warm blood of the living just yet.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: T'es peut-être pas habituée à côtoyer des gens comme nous, mais ne t'inquiète pas, on en est pas encore à sucer le sang chaud des vivants.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.note: horribly hard, first is liberal de. but good enough

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Still, the mines have become rather possessive and demand our full attention these days.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Mais bon, le travail ici nous épuise tellement, que nous n'avons plus l'énergie d'aller ailleurs.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Some strong hands that can help clean up a mess on the surface would be most welcome.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: C'est pour ça qu'on pourrait avoir besoin d'une bonne paire de mains courageuses pour s'occuper du foutoir qu'on a à la surface.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: There's been an incursion of some thrice-darned hopping furballs in one of our still-active mining areas.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Il y a eu une intrusion hostile de ces satanées boules de poils sauteuses dans une de nos mines encore active.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Those pesky things got contaminated by the ores and machinery inside and now they're running wild in \v[area.bergen-trails.name].
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Cette bande de sagouins a été souillée par les minerais et les machines à l'intérieur et maintenant ils grouillent sur le \v[area.bergen-trails.name].

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: What's worse, for some damn reason the filthy fur made them angry as drunk bovines and almost impossible to kill.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Mais le pire, c'est que leurs poils puants ont l'air de rendre ces bestioles aussi agressives que des taureaux bourrés et quasiment invincibles.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.note: de: truie, en: bovin bourré, fr: ? taureau ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Just my thoughts.\. Care to help us get rid of that mess before we get the blame for whatever shins they kick?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: On espérait que vous vous en occupiez, avant que ça ne dégénère et que l'on devienne les vilains responsables ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Finally some good news.\. Now, I guess I'd better tell you how to get rid of those indestructible pests, eh?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Enfin !\. Bon il faut peut-être que je vous dise comment se débarrasser de ces bestioles indestructibles, hein ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: It's rather simple.\. Their fur is \c[3]hardened\c[0] by whatever dirt got stuck in it, so all they need is a good bath.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: C'est très facile.\. Leur fourrure est \c[3]durcie\c[0] par je ne sais quelle crasse coincée dedans. Ils ont juste besoin d'un bon bain.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Don't worry, there's no need to hunt them with a sponge and bucket.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, pas besoin d'aller les chasser avec un seau et une éponge.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Just give them a good \c[3]shove into the nearest lake\c[0] and then hammer their freshly-bathed butts into the ground.\. Got it?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Tu les \c[3]balances dans la flotte\c[0] et ensuite, pendant qu'ils sont trempés, tu les frappes par terre.\. C'est compris ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Good, you better get going then.\. I will give you their location.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bien, tu ferais bien d'y aller alors.\. Je vais te dire où ils sont.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.note: de: ferait mieux sur tes chaussettes

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Bye.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bye.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Darn, really?\. Already scared of some dirty Frobbits?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Mince, vraiment ?\. Les Grelapins, y a pas de quoi s'en faire dans son futal, pourtant ?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.note: de is like faut pas s'en faire. t'a déjà fait dans ton pantalon ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Better hurry and skin those sacks of fur.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Dépêche-toi et scalpe-moi ces tas de fourrures.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.note: de: scalpe moi ce qu'ils ont au-dessus des oreilles

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Remember, a bath in any body of water will clean them and make them vulnerable again.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Souviens-toi, un bain dans la flotte va les laver et les rendra vulnérables à nouveau.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: You got rid of all them dirty frobbits already?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Tu t'es déjà débarrassé de tous les grelapins sales ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Great, you really helped us out here.\. We would've fallen behind with our mining operation otherwise.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Super ! Tu nous as vraiment sauvé la mise.\. Sans toi on aurait encore débordé du planning.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Here, take your reward, fresh from the mines.\. And there'll be more where that came from in the future!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Tiens, ta récompense, tout frais de la mine.\. Et il va y en avoir d'autres de là où ça vient !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Bye!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bye !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Har, pleasure to see you again \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Aah, ravi de te revoir, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: And that warmth... you've conquered the Temple Mine and claimed the power of Heat, eh?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Et cette chaleur... T'as récupéré le pouvoir du Chaud du \v[area.cold-dng.name], hein ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Well done.\. That could help us a lot with our current projects underground.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bon boulot.\. Ça pourrait faire des miracles pour le boulot du jour qu'on a.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Are you up for some mining work?\. There are explosives, you will love it!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: T'es prête pour faire du travail de minage ?\. Il y aura des explosifs, tu vas adorer !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: I knew that you wouldn't wanna miss out on a chance to handle some bombs!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Je savais déjà que tu ne voudrais pas rater une occasion de manipuler quelques bombes !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: It's not all fun and blasting, though.\. You'll need to clear out some rocks and also get rid of some damn resilient pests again.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bien sûr, suffit pas d'allumer et de faire péter des trucs.\. Il faut aussi s'occuper de quelques rochers et de petites pestes résistantes.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Yep, whatever you do on the Track, those always tend to appear.\. But this time explosives should do the trick.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Oui, peut importe ce qu'on fait sur le Tracé, ils finissent toujours par apparaître.\. Mais cette fois, les explosifs devraient t'aider.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Go through the \c[3]door at the back\c[0] and take the\c[3] elevator down\c[0] to the \c[3]first underground floor\c[0] to reach the mine.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Passe la \c[3]porte de derrière\c[0] et prend l'\c[3]ascenseur\c[0] jusqu'au \c[3]premier sous-sol\c[0] pour atteindre la mine.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: \c[3]Miner Darrel\c[0] will wait for you on the spot and fill you in on the details.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: le \c[3]Mineur Darrel\c[0] t'attendra sur les lieux et t'expliquera le reste.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Bye.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bye.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Not in the mood to blow stuff up?\. Something's wrong with you, girl.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Pas envie de faire péter des trucs ?\. Il y a quelque chose qui ne va pas chez vous, madame.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Report in with \c[3]Darrel\c[0] in our \c[3]first mine\c[0].\. You can reach it with \c[3]our elevator behind those doors\c[0] here.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Va voir \c[3]Darrel\c[0] dans notre \c[3]première mine\c[0].\. Tu peux l'atteindre avec l'\c[3]ascenseur derrière ces portes\c[0].

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Good to see you back, Sunshine.\. Is the mine clear again?
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Ah, ma p'tite fleur de soleil.\. Est-ce que la mine est de nouveau sûre ?

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: I see.\. And you even blew up half a mountain of bugs by yourself?\. Splendid work, truly!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Je vois.\. J'ai cru entendre que tu as fait péter des tas d'insectes à toi toute seule ?\. Du super boulot, vraiment !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: And that... whatever it is you found there.\. It has some weird properties.\. We will look into that.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Et le...\. truc que tu as trouvé, il a des propriétés étranges.\. On va regarder ça.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: With any luck, we can finally make some real progress now.\. You're always welcome to lend us a hand!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Avec un peu de chances, on va finir par y arriver.\. Tu es toujours la bienvenue pour nous filer un coup de main !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: In fact... you might want to pay Darrel another visit.\. He had some bold ideas for after the job was done.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Tiens d'ailleurs... Tu devrais retourner voir Darrel.\. Il a eu d'autres nouvelles idées audacieuses depuis la dernière fois.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Bye!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bye !

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: McEdinthil
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: McEdinthil

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker], everything's running smoothly.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker] ! Tout marche comme ça devrait.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: That being said, there might still be work for you, down in the mines.\. You could talk to our miners down there.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Mais peut-être qu'il y a quelques petits boulots à faire pour toi en ce moment.\. Parles-en à nos mineurs en bas.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Guard
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Garde

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: Oh, hey \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. I got something for you from \c[3]Darrel\c[0] downstairs, as a reward for helping him.
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: Oh, Ohé \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. \c[3]Darrel\c[0] m'a donné quelque chose pour toi, comme récompense pour ton aide.

maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.orig: I guess he just forgot to give it to you after the job.\. Anyway, I got more of those if you got the material!
maps/bergen/inner-faction-miners.json/en.text: J'imagine qu'il a juste oublié de te le donner après le travail.\. En tout cas j'en ai d'autres ici, si tu as le matériel !
